name: Hallway Brawl
description:
Press Arrow Keys in the correct sequence to take down enemies!

Known Bug: The game won't forget about an enemy even if it hits you and walks off screen. Make sure to finish enemies off in order to avoid softlocking.

Music: "retro action groove 3" by zagi2 https://freesound.org/people/zagi2/sounds/276699/

 CC 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/

Punch sound: "PUNCH-BOXING-04" by newagesoup: https://freesound.org/people/newagesoup/sounds/348241/

Hurt cry: "PlayerHurt2" by mrickey13 https://freesound.org/people/mrickey13/sounds/515624/
